catalog_info.title: Government & Politics of China
catalog_info.description: This course is a broad introduction to the main issues of contemporary Chinese politics and social change. The course is divided into two sections:  the first section covers the period from the end of the last imperial dynasty to the end of the Cultural Revolution in 1976.  The second section examines the last thirty years of economic reform, looking at both how the reforms began and how they were sustained.
